Name: Zanzibar
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tangy rum and citrus with fruit and hints of almond.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Zanzi Bar in Prague, Czech Republic.
Nutrition: One serving of Zanzibar contains 200 calories
